context.item: You will analyze rendered PDF page images to identify all structural elements requiring accessibility tags.
Your primary output is a JSON array of elements with their bounding boxes in NORMALIZED coordinates (0.0 to 1.0 range).
The coordinate system has origin (0,0) at the TOP-LEFT corner of the image.
X increases LEFT to RIGHT (0.0 = left edge, 1.0 = right edge).
Y increases TOP to BOTTOM (0.0 = top edge, 1.0 = bottom edge).
Each bounding box must tightly fit the visible content of the element.
Elements must be returned in logical reading order (typically top-to-bottom, left-to-right for Western documents).
For multi-column layouts, process each column separately in reading order.
Nested elements (e.g., list items within a list) should be identified with their parent relationship.
